subject: junit.textui.TestRunner vs junit.swingui.TestRunner
msgSnippet: Hi, When I run junit.textui.TestRunner, everything works fine. When I run junit.swingui.TestRunner instead, I get the exception trace shown below. What s
messageBody:
Hi,

When I run junit.textui.TestRunner, everything works fine.

When I run junit.swingui.TestRunner instead, I get the exception
trace shown below.

What's wrong? How can I get the swing version to work?

Thanks,

- Brian


org.jdom.JDOMException: Error in building:
org.apache.xerces.parsers.SAXParser
at org.jdom.input.SAXBuilder.build(SAXBuilder.java:411)
at org.jdom.input.SAXBuilder.build(SAXBuilder.java:464)
at xercestest.TestData.setUp(TestData.java:18)
Root cause: java.lang.ClassCastException:
org.apache.xerces.parsers.SAXParser
at org.jdom.input.SAXBuilder.build(SAXBuilder.java:295)
at org.jdom.input.SAXBuilder.build(SAXBuilder.java:464)
